trans-unit.source: Provides a common interface and functionality for classes to add SOAP extension information to a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object on a per-method basis.
trans-unit.target: 提供通用接口和功能，为要添加到信息的 SOAP 扩展类<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>分别为每个方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector"></xref> class
Generates service-specific description information that gets placed in a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object corresponding to a binding.
trans-unit.target: 生成获取放入的特定于服务的说明信息<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>对应一个绑定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of a class derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> class that invokes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置派生自抽象类的实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref>类时，将调用<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>方法。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector>`abstract` class, you do not need to implement a class that is derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector> to invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod%2A> method or to set the ReflectionContext property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你实现派生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector>`abstract`类，则你不需要实现派生自类<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector>来调用<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod%2A>方法或设置 ReflectionContext 属性。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector></xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector>

trans-unit.source: The instance of a class derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref> class that invokes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*> method.
trans-unit.target: 从抽象派生类的实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ProtocolReflector"></xref>类时，将调用<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>方法。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapExtensionReflector.ReflectMethod*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Abstract" name="Abstract" href=""></xref> method that a derived class must implement to add SOAP extension information to a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object on a per-method basis.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Abstract" name="Abstract" href=""></xref>为 SOAP 扩展将信息添加到派生的类必须实现的方法<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>分别为每个方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: TheReflectMethodmethod is called for each Web method that belongs to a binding that the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>represents.
trans-unit.target: 为每个绑定所属的 Web 方法调用 TheReflectMethodmethod，<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>表示。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: The ReflectMethod method does not use the Web method directly.
trans-unit.target: ReflectMethod 方法不直接使用 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP extension information gets added for all Web methods in a binding reflected from a Web service class.
trans-unit.target: 对于 Web 服务类中反映绑定中的所有 Web 方法添加获取信息的 SOAP 扩展。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the ReflectMethod can generate information like operation binding, `abstract` operation, and messages.
trans-unit.target: ReflectMethod 的实现可以生成信息，如操作绑定`abstract`操作和消息。
